Author: carbslut
Text: Also contact your insurance. I know with mine, if there isn’t an in-network specialist with a certain amount of miles, they will pay out of network. Maybe it’s similar for treatments?

Author: oranges2orangejuice
Text: Contact each of the treatment centers and explain your situation. Ask if they have any discount programs you could see if you qualified for. You could also go to your local government office to see what resources they can connect you with.
